content.rendered:
Ole Miss sweethearts Sarah Frances and Jackson tied the knot with a fall wedding with burgundy and navy accents at The Bell Tower.

This collegiate couple wanted to keep things simple, opting for a classic fall color palette, plenty of greenery and modern string lighting. Plus a fun, stress-free day of course!

Following one of the most memorable moments of the day, their first look, Sarah Frances and Jackson made their way to The Bell Tower for a sweet ceremony in between the windows.

Greenery lined the aisle and they exchanged vows in front of a modern string light backdrop by Infinity's production team.

After the ceremony, guests made their way to the patio. They mixed and mingled and sipped on Infinity's beer and wine selections before dinner.

Dinner was served buffet-style shortly after. Fresh, garden salads were at the ready at each place setting. Selections included buttermilk fried chicken breast, four-cheese macaroni, and garlic parmesan mashed potatoes.

The evening wrapped up with the sweetest bundt cake and matching bundtinis from Nothing Bundt Cakes for dessert, while the couple danced to Promise to Love Her by Blane Howard.

Scroll on for more from this burgundy and navy fall wedding.

WEDDING DETAILS

Date: October 20, 2018
Bride & Groom: Sarah Frances and Jackson
Location: The Bell Tower
Guest Count: 171
Colors: Burgundy, Navy, Blush & Gold
Photographer: Details Nashville
Paper Goods: Paper Refinery
Florist: PS Designs
Cake: Nothing Bundt Cakes
Linens: Liberty Party Rental
DJ: DJ Lukas
Catering & Bar: The Bell Tower
Production Design: Infinity Hospitality
Planning: Emily O. | IH

excerpt.rendered: A fun, fall burgundy wedding ceremony & reception at The Bell Tower.
